name: acuity-bookmarks-backend
description: Backend for AcuityBookmarks Chrome Extension - Pure Bun Native + Intelligent Web Crawler

scripts.start: bun server-bun-native.js # 启动 Bun 原生后端（开发端口 3000）
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production bun server-bun-native.js # 生产模式启动后端（启用优化）
scripts.dev: bunx wrangler dev # 本地运行 Cloudflare Worker（端口 8787）
scripts.deploy: bunx wrangler deploy # 部署 Cloudflare Worker 到平台
scripts.dev:enhanced: bun scripts/dev-server.js # 增强型开发：热重启、就绪探测、忽略规则
scripts.dev:watch: bun --watch server-bun-native.js # 轻量文件监听热重载（改动即重启）
scripts.dev:inspect: bun --hot --inspect server-bun-native.js # 开启 Inspector 断点/性能调试
scripts.dev:verbose: bun --hot --verbose server-bun-native.js # 详细日志模式
scripts.build: echo "Bun native build completed - no transpilation needed" # Bun 原生无需转译
scripts.lint:check: eslint . --cache || echo '⚠️  ESLint found issues but continuing...' # 严格检查但不中断
scripts.audit: bun audit # 依赖安全审计
scripts.health-check: curl -f http://localhost:3000/health || exit 1 # 本地健康检查
scripts.benchmark: bun benchmark.js # 运行性能基准测试
scripts.performance: bun --prof server-bun-native.js # 启用性能分析运行后端
